Author: PetitCinnamonPumpkin
Text: Ok. I can’t eat them all today, so I plan on taking some to work. Now the only thing is, I leave my house at 5am and I won’t eat them until 12pm. I’ll freeze them the night before, take em out of the freezer at 5 am, and leave an ice pack in my lunchbox . (Haha who eats food ) is that ok too tho?

Author: dirtfacegirl
Text: yes! if you leave milk out even for two hours it’s still fine to drink as long as it doesn’t seem funky! i’d say go ahead, grocery stores leave pastries out for days on end and still sell them.
